mapper.select: SELECT * from resource where categoryId = 1 and isDeleted != 1 and id in (SELECT DISTINCT resourceId from role_resource where isDeleted != 1 and roleId in (SELECT role_id FROM sysusers_role WHERE sysusers_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted != 1)) order by orderNum

SELECT * from resource where categoryId = 2 and isDeleted != 1 and parentId = #{parentId} and id in (SELECT DISTINCT resourceId from role_resource where isDeleted != 1 and roleId in (SELECT role_id FROM sysusers_role WHERE sysusers_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted != 1)) order by orderNum

SELECT * FROM resource WHERE isDeleted != 1 AND id IN (SELECT DISTINCT resourceId FROM role_resource WHERE isDeleted != 1 AND roleId IN (SELECT role_id FROM sysusers_role WHERE sysusers_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted != 1))
SELECT * from resource where parentId = 0 and isDeleted != 1 order by orderNum
SELECT * from resource where parentId = #{parentId} and isDeleted != 1 order by orderNum

SELECT r.id,rr.id as role_res_id from resource r LEFT join (SELECT id,resourceId from role_resource where isDeleted != 1 and roleId = #{roleId}) rr ON r.id = rr.resourceId where r.isDeleted != 1 and r.id in (SELECT DISTINCT resourceId from role_resource where isDeleted != 1 and roleId = #{roleId})
